sentences.sContent: Matters debated in meetings do not become a mandate automatically.
sentences.sCn: 会议上讨论的事宜并不能自动成为一项指令。

synos.tran: 授权；[法]命令，指令；委托管理；受命进行的工作

words.tran: 发训令（过去式mandamused，过去分词mandamused，现在分词mandamusing，第三人称单数mandamuses）

trans.tranCn: 授权；命令，指令；委托管理；受命进行的工作
trans.tranOther: if a government or official has a mandate to make important decisions, they have the authority to make the decisions because they have been elected by the people to do so
to give someone the right or power to do something
